decision_conditions: The proposed development, by reason of its excessive scale, bulk, mass and crowned roof form would appear as an unacceptably cramped, dominant and visually intrusive feature, harmful to the appearance of the street scene  and the surrounding area contrary to Residential Extensions and Alterations and Emerson Park Policy Area SPDs, Policies DC61 and DC69 of the LDF Core Strategy and Development Control Policies DPD and Policy 7.4 of the London Plan.

Statement Required by Article 35 (2) of the Town and Country Planning (Development Management Procedure) (England) Order 2015: Consideration was given to seeking amendments, but given conflict with adopted planning policy, notification of intended refusal and the reason(s) for it was given to Mr Charles (Agent) by e-mail on 11/02/20.

Please be advised that approval of this application from 1st September 2019 (either by London Borough of Havering, or subsequently by PINS if allowed on appeal following a refusal by London Borough of Havering) will attract a liability payment of £41,250 plus indexation in Community Infrastructure Levy (CIL). This charge has been levied under s.206 of the Planning Act 2008 and includes both the Mayor of London's CIL and Havering Council's CIL.
London Borough of Havering, as CIL collecting authority, has responsibility for the collection of the Mayoral CIL, in addition to Havering's CIL, on commencement of the development.

Your proposal is subject to a CIL Liability Notice indicating a levy of £41,250 plus indexation for the application, based on the Mayoral CIL levy rate for Havering of £25/sq.m plus Havering's charging rate for residential of £125/sq.m (Zone A) and the floorspace of 275 square metres.
You are advised to visit the planning portal
description: Two storey front, rear and side extensions to include rear balcony, new front entrance porch. Formation of second floor to include raising and alterations to roof, rear dormer with Juliette balcony and 2No.front dormer and 1.No side dormer windows.
